verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> ba-'Et And it came to pass at that time הַהִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv, he וַיֵּ֥רֶד <S%H3381><s%> vai-Ye-red went down יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah that Judah מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> me-'Et אֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav; from his brethren וַיֵּ֛ט <S%H5186><s%> vai-Yet and turned עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish in to a certain עֲדֻלָּמִ֖י <S%H5726><s%> 'a-dul-la-Mi Adullamite וּשְׁמ֥וֹ <S%H8034><s%> u-she-Mo whose name חִירָֽה׃ <S%H2437><s%> chi-Rah. [was] Hirah

וַיַּרְא־ <S%H7200><s%> vai-yar- saw שָׁ֧ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah And Judah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- there a daughter אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish of a certain כְּנַעֲנִ֖י <S%H3669><s%> ke-na-'a-Ni Canaanite וּשְׁמ֣וֹ <S%H8034><s%> u-she-Mo whose name שׁ֑וּעַ <S%H7770><s%> Shu-a'; [was] Shuah וַיִּקָּחֶ֖הָ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-ka-Che-ha and he took her וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo and went in אֵלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-ha. about

וַתַּ֖הַר <S%H2029><s%> vat-Ta-har And she conceived וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> vat-Te-led and bare בֵּ֑ן <S%H1121><s%> Ben; a son וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra and he called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo his name עֵֽר׃ <S%H6147><s%> 'Er. Er

וַתַּ֥הַר <S%H2029><s%> vat-Ta-har And she conceived ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od again וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> vat-Te-led again and bare בֵּ֑ן <S%H1121><s%> Ben; a son וַתִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> vat-tik-Ra and she called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo his name אוֹנָֽן׃ <S%H209><s%> o-Nan. Onan

וַתֹּ֤סֶף <S%H3254><s%> vat-To-sef And she yet again conceived עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> 'Od still וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> vat-Te-led and bare בֵּ֔ן <S%H1121><s%> Ben, a son וַתִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> vat-tik-Ra and called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo his name שֵׁלָ֑ה <S%H7956><s%> she-Lah; Shelah וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become בִכְזִ֖יב <S%H3580><s%> vich-Ziv and he was at Chezib בְּלִדְתָּ֥הּ <S%H3205><s%> be-lid-Tah when she bare אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To.

וַיִּקַּ֧ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach took יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah And Judah אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah a wife לְעֵ֣ר <S%H6147><s%> le-'Er for Er בְּכוֹר֑וֹ <S%H1060><s%> be-cho-Ro; his firstborn וּשְׁמָ֖הּ <S%H8034><s%> u-she-Mah whose name תָּמָֽר׃ <S%H8559><s%> ta-Mar. [was] Tamar

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, become עֵ֚ר <S%H6147><s%> 'er And Er בְּכ֣וֹר <S%H1060><s%> be-Chor firstborn יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, Judah's רַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> ra' was wicked בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וַיְמִתֵ֖הוּ <S%H4191><s%> vay-mi-Te-hu slew יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. and the LORD

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah And Judah לְאוֹנָ֔ן <S%H209><s%> le-'o-Nan, unto Onan בֹּ֛א <S%H935><s%> bo Go in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet wife אָחִ֖יךָ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi-cha unto thy brother's וְיַבֵּ֣ם <S%H2992><s%> ve-yab-Bem and marry אֹתָ֑הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah; וְהָקֵ֥ם <S%H6965><s%> ve-ha-Kem her and raise up זֶ֖רַע <S%H2233><s%> Ze-ra' seed לְאָחִֽיךָ׃ <S%H251><s%> le-'a-Chi-cha. to thy brother

וַיֵּ֣דַע <S%H3045><s%> vai-Ye-da' knew אוֹנָ֔ן <S%H209><s%> o-Nan, And Onan כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹּ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not ל֖וֹ lo יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become הַזָּ֑רַע <S%H2233><s%> haz-Za-ra'; that the seed וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah not be his so אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- should not be his and it came to pass when בָּ֨א <S%H935><s%> ba he went in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אֵ֤שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet wife אָחִיו֙ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chiv unto his brother's וְשִׁחֵ֣ת <S%H7843><s%> ve-shi-Chet that he spilled אַ֔רְצָה <S%H776><s%> 'Ar-tzah, [it] on the ground לְבִלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti lest נְתָן־ <S%H5414><s%> ne-ton- that he should give זֶ֖רַע <S%H2233><s%> Ze-ra' seed לְאָחִֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> le-'a-Chiv. to his brother

וַיֵּ֛רַע <S%H7489><s%> vai-Ye-ra' was displeasing בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei the sight יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher And the thing which עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah; he did וַיָּ֖מֶת <S%H4191><s%> vai-Ya-met wherefore he slew גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- also אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To.

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said יְהוּדָה֩ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah Judah לְתָמָ֨ר <S%H8559><s%> le-ta-Mar to Tamar כַּלָּת֜וֹ <S%H3618><s%> kal-la-To his daughter in law שְׁבִ֧י <S%H3427><s%> she-Vi Remain אַלְמָנָ֣ה <S%H490><s%> 'al-ma-Nah a widow בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> veit- house אָבִ֗יךְ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vich, at thy father's עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until יִגְדַּל֙ <S%H1431><s%> yig-Dal be grown שֵׁלָ֣ה <S%H7956><s%> she-Lah till Shelah בְנִ֔י <S%H1121><s%> ve-Ni, my son כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar, for he said פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- lest יָמ֥וּת <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut Lest peradventure he die גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- too ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he כְּאֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> ke-'e-Chav; also as his brethren וַתֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vat-Te-lech went תָּמָ֔ר <S%H8559><s%> ta-Mar, [did] And Tamar וַתֵּ֖שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vat-Te-shev and dwelt בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house אָבִֽיהָ׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-ha. in her father's

וַיִּרְבּוּ֙ <S%H7235><s%> vai-yir-Bu And in process הַיָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Mim, of time וַתָּ֖מָת <S%H4191><s%> vat-Ta-mot died בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- the daughter שׁ֣וּעַ <S%H7770><s%> Shu-a' of Shuah אֵֽשֶׁת־ <S%H802><s%> 'e-shet- wife יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah; Judah's וַיִּנָּ֣חֶם <S%H5162><s%> vai-yin-Na-chem was comforted יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, and Judah וַיַּ֜עַל <S%H5927><s%> vai-Ya-'al and went up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and גֹּֽזֲזֵ֤י <S%H1494><s%> go-za-Zei cut off צֹאנוֹ֙ <S%H6629><s%> tzo-No cattle ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, he וְחִירָ֛ה <S%H2437><s%> ve-chi-Rah Hirah רֵעֵ֥הוּ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu he and his friend הָעֲדֻלָּמִ֖י <S%H5726><s%> ha-'a-dul-la-Mi the Adullamite תִּמְנָֽתָה׃ <S%H8553><s%> tim-Na-tah. to Timnath

וַיֻּגַּ֥ד <S%H5046><s%> vai-yug-Gad And it was told לְתָמָ֖ר <S%H8559><s%> le-ta-Mar Tamar לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold חָמִ֛יךְ <S%H2524><s%> cha-Mich Behold thy father in law עֹלֶ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> 'o-Leh goeth up תִמְנָ֖תָה <S%H8553><s%> tim-Na-tah to Timnath לָגֹ֥ז <S%H1494><s%> la-Goz to shear צֹאנֽוֹ׃ <S%H6629><s%> tzo-No. his sheep

וַתָּסַר֩ <S%H5493><s%> vat-ta-Sar off בִּגְדֵ֨י <S%H899><s%> big-Dei garments אַלְמְנוּתָ֜הּ <S%H491><s%> 'al-me-nu-Tah her widow's מֵֽעָלֶ֗יהָ <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-Lei-ha, and וַתְּכַ֤ס <S%H3680><s%> vat-te-Chas from her and covered her בַּצָּעִיף֙ <S%H6809><s%> batz-tza-'If with a vail וַתִּתְעַלָּ֔ף <S%H5968><s%> vat-tit-'al-Laf, and wrapped herself וַתֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> vat-Te-shev and sat in בְּפֶ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> be-Fe-tach place עֵינַ֔יִם <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Na-yim, an open אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- is on דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech which [is] by the way תִּמְנָ֑תָה <S%H8553><s%> tim-Na-tah; to Timnath כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for רָאֲתָה֙ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'a-Tah for she saw כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for גָדַ֣ל <S%H1431><s%> ga-Dal was grown שֵׁלָ֔ה <S%H7956><s%> she-Lah, that Shelah וְהִ֕וא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hiv he לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- had not נִתְּנָ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> nit-te-Nah and she was not given ל֖וֹ lo לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> le-'ish-Shah. unto him to wife

וַיִּרְאֶ֣הָ <S%H7200><s%> vai-yir-'E-ha saw her יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, When Judah וַֽיַּחְשְׁבֶ֖הָ <S%H2803><s%> vai-yach-she-Ve-ha he thought לְזוֹנָ֑ה <S%H2181><s%> le-zo-Nah; her [to be] an harlot כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for כִסְּתָ֖ה <S%H3680><s%> chis-se-Tah because she had covered פָּנֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-ha. her face

וַיֵּ֨ט <S%H5186><s%> vai-Yet And he turned אֵלֶ֜יהָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-ha about אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to her הַדֶּ֗רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> had-De-rech, unto her by the way וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said הָֽבָה־ <S%H3051><s%> ha-vah- Go to נָּא֙ <S%H4994><s%> na now אָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> a-Vo I pray thee let me come in אֵלַ֔יִךְ <S%H413><s%> 'e-La-yich, about כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo did not יָדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da', unto thee (for he knew כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for כַלָּת֖וֹ <S%H3618><s%> chal-la-To was his daughter-in-law הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> hi and she וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer said מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What תִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> tit-ten- What wilt thou give לִּ֔י Li, כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki that תָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo me that thou mayest come in אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai. about

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I אֲשַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> 'a-shal-Lach I will send גְּדִֽי־ <S%H1423><s%> ge-di- kid עִזִּ֖ים <S%H5795><s%> 'iz-Zim goat מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַצֹּ֑אן <S%H6629><s%> hatz-Tzon; from the flock וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer And she said אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo תִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> tit-Ten Wilt thou give עֵרָב֖וֹן <S%H6162><s%> e-ra-Von [me] a pledge עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad until שָׁלְחֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7971><s%> shal-Che-cha. till thou send

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, And he said מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> mah What הָֽעֵרָבוֹן֮ <S%H6162><s%> ha-'e-ra-Von pledge אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher What אֶתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> 'et-ten- shall I give לָּךְ֒ loCh וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer, thee;And she said חֹתָֽמְךָ֙ <S%H2368><s%> cho-ta-me-Cha Thy signet וּפְתִילֶ֔ךָ <S%H6616><s%> u-fe-ti-Le-cha, and thy bracelets וּמַטְּךָ֖ <S%H4294><s%> u-mat-te-Cha and thy staff אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher is in בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-De-cha; that [is] in thine hand וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-ten- And he gave לָּ֛הּ lah וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo [it] her and came in אֵלֶ֖יהָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-ha to וַתַּ֥הַר <S%H2029><s%> vat-Ta-har unto her and she conceived לֽוֹ׃ lo.
